wikipedia_page.main: Jemima Phillips is an English-born Welsh harpist.

response: *Jemima Phillips – Official Harpist to the Prince of Wales (2004–2007)

link_mentions.page: Official Harpist to the Prince of Wales
Royal Households of the United Kingdom
response: In 2000, the Prince revived a tradition of having an official harpist, a role last seen under Queen Victoria. The first holder of the office was Catrin Finch, followed in 2004 by Jemima Phillips, and in 2007 by Claire Jones.
